channel.title: New User Question
channel.description:
I am new to this. I infact started this today and I was hoping for starter great up-to date tutorials on this thing for Window 7. And well I will post a few questions of mine. [ul][li]I am un-able to log into a server at the moparisthebest.com Webclient page. (And the IP is correct but I keep getting "Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click "Cancel" then "Start Server" to make your own." and I done that hundreds of times)[/li] [li]I downloaded the program but un-able to edit my own game. I even try clicking on "runMoparScape.bat" program and I get
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
[/li] [li]How do I fully create my own server world? Where I build the place where the player lands, my own way how the world works, and things like that.[/li][/ul] I am using the up-to date Java program and also the up-to date MoparScape program so I have no idea what I am missing. I would be glad if you tell me so I can work on my project.

item.title: New User Question
item.dc:creator: @Rexxy Rexxy
item.description:
@Rexxy wrote:

To build you’re own private server, well first it’s really easy depending on what version you have. I am coding a 317 right now. <317 loading 508> They are really easy and there are alot of guides on how to code it. but you go into config.java, scroll down till you see start location, die location, etc. change those to the home you want and you’re done! If you don’t get it private message me and ill walk you through it.

Read full topic

item.title: New User Question
item.dc:creator: @Storm_Powner Storm Powner
item.description:
@Storm_Powner wrote:

change the java in your run.bat.

and the jdk version in your compiler.

if you can’t do that say wich jdk, and java verison you use, and post compiler and run here, by right click, edit, and then post it

Read full topic

item.title: New User Question
item.dc:creator: @Dark_Syvian Dark_Syvian
item.description:
@Dark_Syvian wrote:

I am new to this. I infact started this today and I was hoping for starter great up-to date tutorials on this thing for Window 7. And well I will post a few questions of mine.

[ul][li]I am un-able to log into a server at the moparisthebest.com Webclient page. (And the IP is correct but I keep getting “Error connecting to server. Must be down. Click “Cancel” then “Start Server” to make your own.” and I done that hundreds of times)[/li]
[li]I downloaded the program but un-able to edit my own game. I even try clicking on “runMoparScape.bat” program and I get

‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
[/li]
[li]How do I fully create my own server world? Where I build the place where the player lands, my own way how the world works, and things like that.[/li][/ul]

I am using the up-to date Java program and also the up-to date MoparScape program so I have no idea what I am missing. I would be glad if you tell me so I can work on my project.

Read full topic
